SEARCH
Package controller.officer

Class OfficerController

java.lang.Object
controller.officer.OfficerController
public class OfficerController extends Object
Handles all officer-related operations in the system, including registration, project management, and applicant-like interactions (e.g. submitting enquiries and applications).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OfficerController(Officer officer, ProjectList projectList, ApplicationList applicationList, EnquiryList enquiryList, WithdrawalList withdrawalList, RegistrationList registrationList)
    Constructs the officer controller and initializes all handlers for both officer-specific and applicant-style functionality.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    showMenu()
    Displays the main dashboard for officer users and handles routing to different menus.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • OfficerController

      public OfficerController(Officer officer, ProjectList projectList, ApplicationList applicationList, EnquiryList enquiryList, WithdrawalList withdrawalList, RegistrationList registrationList)
      Constructs the officer controller and initializes all handlers for both officer-specific and applicant-style functionality.
      Parameters:
      officer - the logged-in officer
      projectList - list of all available projects
      applicationList - list of all applications in the system
      enquiryList - list of all submitted enquiries
      withdrawalList - list of all withdrawal requests
      registrationList - list of all officer registrations

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu()
      Displays the main dashboard for officer users and handles routing to different menus.
